verses.text: \w Likewise|strong="G3668"\w*, ye \w wives|strong="G1135"\w*, \add be\add* in \w subjection|strong="G5293"\w* to your \w own|strong="G2398"\w* \w husbands|strong="G0435"\w*; \w that|strong="G2443"\w*, \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* obey \w not|strong="G0544"\w* the \w word|strong="G3056"\w*, they \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w may|strong="G2770"\w* \w without|strong="G0427"\w* the \w word|strong="G3056"\w* be \w won|strong="G2770"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the conversation of the \w wives|strong="G1135"\w*;
While they \w behold|strong="G2029"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w chaste|strong="G0053"\w* \w conversation|strong="G0391"\w* \add coupled\add* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w fear|strong="G5401"\w*.

\w Whose|strong="G3739"\w* \w adorning|strong="G2889"\w* let \w it|strong="G2077"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w be|strong="G2077"\w* that \w outward|strong="G1855"\w* \add adorning\add* of \w plaiting|strong="G1708"\w* the \w hair|strong="G2359"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of \w wearing|strong="G4025"\w* of \w gold|strong="G5553"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* of putting \w on|strong="G1745"\w* of \w apparel|strong="G2440"\w*;

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* \add let it be\add* the \w hidden|strong="G2927"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w* of the \w heart|strong="G2588"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* that which is not \w corruptible|strong="G0862"\w*, \add even the ornament\add* of a \w meek|strong="G4239"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w quiet|strong="G2272"\w* \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* in the \w sight|strong="G1799"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* of great \w price|strong="G4185"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* after this \w manner|strong="G3779"\w* in the old \w time|strong="G4218"\w* the \w holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w women|strong="G1135"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w*, who \w trusted|strong="G1679"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w adorned|strong="G2885"\w* \w themselves|strong="G1438"\w*, being in \w subjection|strong="G5293"\w* unto their \w own|strong="G2398"\w* \w husbands|strong="G0435"\w*:

Even \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w Sara|strong="G4564"\w* \w obeyed|strong="G5219"\w* \w Abraham|strong="G0011"\w*, \w calling|strong="G2564"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w lord|strong="G2962"\w*: \w whose|strong="G3739"\w* \w daughters|strong="G5043"\w* ye \w are|strong="G1096"\w*, as long as ye do \w well|strong="G0015"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w are|strong="G5399"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w afraid|strong="G5399"\w* with \w any|strong="G3367"\w* \w amazement|strong="G4423"\w*.

\w Likewise|strong="G3668"\w*, ye \w husbands|strong="G0435"\w*, dwell \w with|strong="G4924"\w* \add them\add* according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w knowledge|strong="G1108"\w*, \w giving|strong="G0632"\w* \w honour|strong="G5092"\w* unto the \w wife|strong="G1134"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* unto the \w weaker|strong="G0772"\w* \w vessel|strong="G4632"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* being heirs \w together|strong="G4789"\w* of the \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* of \w life|strong="G2222"\w*; \w that|strong="G1519"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w prayers|strong="G4335"\w* \w be|strong="G1581"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w hindered|strong="G1581"\w*.

\w Finally|strong="G5056"\w*, \add be ye\add* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* of one \w mind|strong="G3675"\w*, having compassion one of \w another|strong="G4835"\w*, love as \w brethren|strong="G5361"\w*, \add be\add* \w pitiful|strong="G2155"\w*, \add be\add* \w courteous|strong="G5391"\w*:

\w Not|strong="G3361"\w* \w rendering|strong="G0591"\w* \w evil|strong="G2556"\w* \w for|strong="G0473"\w* \w evil|strong="G2556"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w railing|strong="G3059"\w* \w for|strong="G0473"\w* \w railing|strong="G3059"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w contrariwise|strong="G5121"\w* \w blessing|strong="G2127"\w*; \w knowing|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* ye \w are|strong="G2564"\w* \w thereunto|strong="G1519"\w* \w called|strong="G2564"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* ye should \w inherit|strong="G2816"\w* a \w blessing|strong="G2129"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* he that \w will|strong="G2309"\w* \w love|strong="G0025"\w* \w life|strong="G2222"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w see|strong="G1492"\w* \w good|strong="G0018"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w*, let him \w refrain|strong="G3973"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w tongue|strong="G1100"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w evil|strong="G2556"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w lips|strong="G5491"\w* that they \w speak|strong="G2980"\w* \w no|strong="G3361"\w* \w guile|strong="G1388"\w*:

Let him \w eschew|strong="G1578"\w* \w evil|strong="G2556"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w good|strong="G0018"\w*; let him \w seek|strong="G2212"\w* \w peace|strong="G1515"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w ensue|strong="G1377"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w For|strong="G3754"\w* the \w eyes|strong="G3788"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \add are\add* \w over|strong="G1909"\w* the \w righteous|strong="G1342"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w ears|strong="G3775"\w* \add are open\add* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w prayers|strong="G1162"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* the \w face|strong="G4383"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \add is\add* \w against|strong="G1909"\w* them that \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w evil|strong="G2556"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w who|strong="G5101"\w* \add is\add* he that will \w harm|strong="G2559"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*, \w if|strong="G1437"\w* ye \w be|strong="G1096"\w* \w followers|strong="G3402"\w* of that which is \w good|strong="G0018"\w*?

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* ye \w suffer|strong="G3958"\w* \w for|strong="G1223"\w* \w righteousnessâ€™ sake|strong="G1343"\w*, \w happy|strong="G3107"\w* \add are ye\add*: \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w be|strong="G5399"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w afraid|strong="G5399"\w* of \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w terror|strong="G5401"\w*, \w neither|strong="G3366"\w* be \w troubled|strong="G5015"\w*;

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w sanctify|strong="G0037"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w hearts|strong="G2588"\w*: \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \add be\add* \w ready|strong="G2092"\w* \w always|strong="G0104"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \add give\add* an \w answer|strong="G0627"\w* to every \w man|strong="G3956"\w* that \w asketh|strong="G0154"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* a \w reason|strong="G3056"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* the \w hope|strong="G1680"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* is \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w meekness|strong="G4240"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w fear|strong="G5401"\w*:

\w Having|strong="G2192"\w* a \w good|strong="G0018"\w* \w conscience|strong="G4893"\w*; \w that|strong="G2443"\w*, \w whereas|strong="G1722"\w* they speak \w evil|strong="G2635"\w* of \w you|strong="G5216"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* of \w evildoers|strong="G2555"\w*, they may be \w ashamed|strong="G2617"\w* that falsely \w accuse|strong="G1908"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w good|strong="G0018"\w* \w conversation|strong="G0391"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \add it is\add* \w better|strong="G2909"\w*, \w if|strong="G1487"\w* the \w will|strong="G2307"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* be \w so|strong="G2309"\w*, that ye \w suffer|strong="G3958"\w* for well \w doing|strong="G0015"\w*, \w than|strong="G2228"\w* for evil \w doing|strong="G2554"\w*.

\w For|strong="G3754"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w hath|strong="G3958"\w* \w once|strong="G0530"\w* \w suffered|strong="G3958"\w* \w for|strong="G4012"\w* \w sins|strong="G0266"\w*, the \w just|strong="G1342"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* the \w unjust|strong="G0094"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* he might \w bring|strong="G4317"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w* to \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, being put to \w death|strong="G2289"\w* in the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w quickened|strong="G2227"\w* by the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w*:

\w By|strong="G1722"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* he \w went|strong="G4198"\w* and \w preached|strong="G2784"\w* unto the \w spirits|strong="G4151"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w prison|strong="G5438"\w*;

Which \w sometime|strong="G4218"\w* were \w disobedient|strong="G0544"\w*, \w when|strong="G3753"\w* \w once|strong="G0530"\w* the \w longsuffering|strong="G3115"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w waited|strong="G1551"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w days|strong="G2250"\w* of \w Noah|strong="G3575"\w*, while the \w ark|strong="G2787"\w* was a \w preparing|strong="G2680"\w*, \w wherein|strong="G1519"\w* \w few|strong="G3641"\w*, \w that|strong="G5124"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w*, \w eight|strong="G3638"\w* \w souls|strong="G5590"\w* were \w saved|strong="G1295"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w water|strong="G5204"\w*.

The like \w figure|strong="G0499"\w* \w whereunto|strong="G3739"\w* \add even\add* \w baptism|strong="G0908"\w* \w doth|strong="G4982"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w* \w save|strong="G4982"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w* (\w not|strong="G3756"\w* the putting \w away|strong="G0595"\w* of the \w filth|strong="G4509"\w* of the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* the \w answer|strong="G1906"\w* of a \w good|strong="G0018"\w* \w conscience|strong="G4893"\w* \w toward|strong="G1519"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*,) \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w resurrection|strong="G0386"\w* of \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*:

\w Who|strong="G3739"\w* is \w gone|strong="G4198"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*, and \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w on|strong="G1722"\w* the right \w hand|strong="G1188"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*; \w angels|strong="G0032"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w authorities|strong="G1849"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w powers|strong="G1411"\w* being made \w subject|strong="G5293"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.
